name: Possession (itch) (SmokyChambers)
description:
We all know of what happened that night Jeff murdered his family.  But do you know what happened before that?  You play as Jeff going through his daily routine and rough life before he becomes a killer.  Interact with objects to uncover memories from his past and learn of his experiences before that dark and gruesome night.  Play and discover how he gives in to the darkness that lurks in the recesses of his mind. 

WARNING: contains violent and bloody elements, mild language, murder and death
